string-array.name: rv_page_started
string-array.item: %dtpurl\nPage Started URL\nURL of the page that has started loading.

string-array.name: rv_page_finished
string-array.item: %dtpurl\nPage Finished URL\nURL of the page that has finished loading.

string-array.name: rv_title_received
string-array.item: %dtptitle\nPage Title\nPage title that has been received.

string-array.name: rv_download_started
string-array.item: %dtpurl\nDownloading File URL\nURL of the file that has started downloading.
%dtpua\nUser Agent for Download\nUser agent string that was used in the downlooad request.
%dtpcd\nContent dispostion for Download\nContent disposition of download request.
%dtpmt\nMime type of Download Request\nThe mime type requested for download.
